summary: Website to connect employers with employees (job marketplace/matching platform).
architectural_notes: Founder/CEO About page content provided by user: Founder is Ayaan Ahmed Dewan (18, from Assam, India); mission/vision emphasizes equitable opportunities, reducing slow/biased job search via smart matching; platform connects employers with talent across tech and essential pros (drivers, carpenters, plumbers, housekeepers); includes sections 'My Vision' and 'Why Me' with provided copy.
Brand tagline to use in UI: "M Employed; Am Employed".
Founder/CEO About page should support displaying a founder photo (profile image) in the about section/page.

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and an onboarding flow that lets a signed-in user choose an account type: Employer or Candidate, and stores that choice in the backend profile.
Create profile management for both roles: Employers can manage company details; Candidates can manage a personal profile including headline, skills, location (free-text), and a short bio.
Enable Employers to create, edit, publish/unpublish, and delete job postings with structured fields (title, description, location, employment type, tags/skills).
Enable Candidates to browse and search published jobs, view job details, and apply to a job with a short message and optional links (e.g., portfolio URL).

Provide an application management workflow: Employers can review applications per job and update application status (e.g., Submitted, Reviewed, Interview, Rejected, Hired); Candidates can view their submitted applications and statuses.

Add a simple asynchronous in-app messaging feature tied to an application: Employers and the Candidate who applied can exchange messages in a thread (no real-time required; load-on-open and manual refresh is acceptable).

Create core navigation and pages: Landing page, Job Browse, Job Detail, Candidate Dashboard (applications), Employer Dashboard (jobs + applications), Profile/Settings; ensure route protection based on authentication and role.
Define and apply a cohesive visual theme across the app (color palette, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a professional marketplace; avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette.

Generate and include basic branded static assets and render them in the UI (logo and a simple landing hero illustration). Store generated images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend.
Generate a new minimalist wordmark logo that reads "M EMPLOYED" and add it as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Update ONLY the selected header logo element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/a[1]/img[1]) to use the new "M EMPLOYED" logo asset and appropriate alt text.

Create a new public Founder/CEO About page that introduces the founder/CEO using English user-facing text, with a clean, professional layout (e.g., headline, short bio, values/mission, and a brief "Why I built M EMPLOYED" section). The page content should be easy to update later (e.g., defined in a single place within the page component).

Add routing and navigation access for the Founder/CEO About page by registering a new route (e.g., /founder) in the TanStack router and adding a visible link to it in the global UI navigation and/or footer so users can reach it from anywhere.

Update the public Founder page content (frontend/src/pages/FounderAboutPage.tsx) to use the provided founder details and sections in English, keeping the content defined in a single editable object within the page component file.

Create a new public “About the Platform” page component that explains what M EMPLOYED is, who it is for (employers and candidates), and how the platform works at a high level. All user-facing text must be in English and the page content must be defined in a single, easy-to-edit object within the page component file (similar to how frontend/src/pages/FounderAboutPage.tsx centralizes its content).
Add routing for the new Platform About page at a top-level route (use /about) in the TanStack Router configuration.
Add visible navigation access to the new /about page from the global UI so users can reach it from anywhere (add a link in the header navigation and in the footer link group).

Add the exact branding tagline text "M Employed; Am Employed" to the public landing page hero section (frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx), displayed near the main hero headline so it is clearly visible to first-time visitors.
Update the About Platform page header tagline to use the exact text "M Employed; Am Employed" by changing the platformContent.tagline value in frontend/src/pages/AboutPlatformPage.tsx.

Add the user-uploaded photo (20240102_161111.jpg) as a static image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated by creating an optimized, square headshot version suitable for an About/Founder profile image.

Update the public Founder About page (frontend/src/pages/FounderAboutPage.tsx) to display the generated founder photo prominently in the header area (near the founder name/role) with appropriate styling (e.g., circular or rounded portrait, consistent spacing) and English alt text.
Add a React Query hook to fetch the member count from the backend actor and cache it under a stable query key.
Display the total member count on the Employer Dashboard page (`frontend/src/pages/employer/EmployerDashboardPage.tsx`) in a small stats card near the top of the page with clear English labeling.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a website that connects employers to employees (job marketplace/matching platform).
Backend data model and APIs: implement stable, persistent storage for users/profiles, job postings, applications, and messages, with authorization checks for every mutation and any sensitive read.
Add gig-style one-time tasks: allow employers to post one-time tasks (e.g., barber, carpenter, plumber, housekeeper) with categories and filtering/browsing for quick gigs.
Add an About page as a new top-level page/route (e.g., /about) linked in navigation/footer, containing provided platform description text.
Add a Founder/CEO About section/page introducing the founder/CEO (bio content to be provided) as part of the platform’s content/pages.
Add the tagline "M Employed; Am Employed" to the relevant public-facing page (e.g., landing hero or the newly created page) as user-facing branding text.
Add the founder/CEO photo to the public About section/page (display a profile image in the Founder/CEO About page/about section).
Add a “member count” feature: provide a backend method to return total registered users (e.g., count of profiles) and display it in the admin/employer dashboard UI.
Add a backend query API that returns the total number of registered members as the count of entries in the `profiles` map.
